channel.title: Call of duty 4 Glitches REVELAED! With Videos!
channel.description:
[size=11pt]Call Of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare Glitch Archive[/size]
[color=brown]INDEX:
Map Glitches Universal Glitches
Map Glitch index:
AmbushBacklot
Bloc
BogCountdown
Crossfire
Crash
Downpour
District
Overgrown
Pipeline
Shipment
Showdown
Strike
Vacant
[size=25pt]Map Glitches
_______________________________________________________________[/size]
AMBUSH
VIDEO HERE [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co8hheVlIC0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co8hheVlIC0[/url]
Out Of The Map 1) Go whole north in the map until you see the end of the map 2) Look right and you’ll see a wall 3) Have one person lying down on the left of the wall 4) Now jump on him and get over the wall
Machinegun Glitch 1) Go whole north of the map where the machine gun is 2) Right of the machinegun is a broken wall 3) Climb on the broken wall and walk above the machine gun 4) Sit down and hit the square button 5) Other people will see you flying above the machinegun while shooting
Skywalker
1) Get yourself out of the map with one other person 2) Now head to the Barbered wire on the east side of the map 3) Use the freeze jump (check Freeze jump for more information) in the barbered wire. 4) Hit select, you will fly in the air and you will land on a invisible platform
__________________________________________________ ____________
Backlot VIDEO HERE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RywxIBhjjG0 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M5_g63kq1m0
On top of the construction Building 1) Head to the north part of the map and you will see a construction building 2) Go to the first floor and jump on the railing of the stairs 3) Go to the end of the railing and jump to the left in the window righ before you 4) Look to the left, go prone and keep going backward until you cant go anymore 5) Now use your Two analog sticks at the same time and push it every second to the right 6) After a few times you should be out of the building 7) Now walk on the small ledge on top of the building
On top of other buildings 1) get on top of the construction building 2) head west on the building and have someone sit down right before the west wall 3) jump on his head so you can get on the wall 4) look around until you see a yellow umbrella 5) jump on it and you can now run on all the buildings on the west side of the map
Out of the map 1) Go to the middle building where you can go up the stairs 2) Go on top of it and jump on the railings 3) Look around until you see a pole 4) Jump on the pole and now you will see a tree 5) Jump in the tree and after you jumped in, jump on the building behind it 6) You can now leave the map and go under it
On the south building 1) Go to the (hald-destroyed) building in the south 2) go to the first room on the right side and you will see a small pile of trash 2) get your friend sitting on it and you need to jump on his head. 3) you are now on the roo of the south building
Out of the map v2 1) go to the north-West of the map, there should be a small parking place for cars 2) jump on the bin on the right side of the parking place 3) now jump over the wall right before you. 4) you will find yourself out of the map
On Top of big building 1) First do the "Out Of The Map Glitch" 2) stay on the first building, look to the right and you will see a small window with a ventilator on it 3) first jump on the ledge of the window, then jump on the ventilator 4) you can now jump on top of the building
Under the map 1) Do any glitch out of the map 2) find a black place on the ground where you can jump in 3) jump in it and you will find yourself under the map
Out of the map v3 1) Go north-west of the map where you see a small parking place 2) look around untill you see boxes with a invisible wall around it 3) have someone sitting right of the boxes, and jump on his head 4) jump untill you find yourself on the wall right next to the invisible wall 5) jump off the wall and you are out of the map

item.title: Call of duty 4 Glitches REVELAED! With Videos!
item.dc:creator: @Kevin3654 Kevin3654
item.description:
@Kevin3654 wrote:

BLOC:

above the swimming pool

  1. Go to the stairs at the swimming pool
  2. jump-crouch on the right side of the stairs
  3. now go to up until there is one level above you
  4. jump-crouch on the ledge
  5. look down untill you see a pole
  6. now jump on the pole
  7. now jump in one of the broken windows of the building
  8. you can now enter the building

On top of the east appartement

  1. go to the south-east stairs and jump-crouch over the fence
  2. go up the stairs and jump over to the other stairs ont he other side
  3. now look down untill you see the east appartement
  4. you will see a small ledge, jump on it and you wont die.(if you jump next to it, you will fall to your death)
  5. you are now on the east appartement

On top of stairs inside the west building

  1. go in the west building and you wil see damaged stairs
  2. get your friend standingright under it so you can jump on his head
  3. jump on his head and have your friend jumping so you can get on the stairs
  4. you are now on the stairs of the west building

Bog:

No Videos Found

Out of the map

  1. Go west of the map untill you see a market stall
  2. get your friend crouching under the little metal roof
  3. jump on his head so you can jump on the little metal roof
  4. when you are on it, jump over on the fence to the right
  5. just walk over the fence untill you can’t go further
  6. go right and walk over the invisible wall
  7. now jump off it to the left, and you are out of the map

Under the map

  1. go soutch of the map right to the middle building
  2. jump on the bin and do the freezejump
  3. let a friend shoot you 10 times 4 bullets in your back
  4. hit the select button and land on the invisible wall
  5. now just jump off in the black area and you are under the map

Countdown

Out of the map

  1. go west of the map at the trucks
  2. jump on the trucks and do the freeze jump
  3. let a friend shoot you 10 times 4 bullets in your back
  4. hit the select button and land perfect on the invisible wall right before you
  5. jump off the invisible wall and land on the small building under you
  6. now just jump off the building and you are uot of the map

on the building in the middle

  1. go north of the map at a container with trash in it
  2. jumo on the small ledg on the wall before you
  3. look right and you will see a small border on the middle house where you can walk on
  4. jump on it and walk untill you can’t go further anymore
  5. now let a friend jump on you and do the knife jump for a boost
  6. your friend will be on the middle building now

on the mountains

  1. go north-east to the map where you can find a missisle launcher
  2. jump on it and do the freezejump there with your face to the north mountains
  3. have your friend shoot you 14 times 4 bullets in your back
  4. hit the selcet button and try to land on the mountains
  5. you can now walk on the mountains withous falling throught it

on the destroyed helicopter

  1. go north east of the map where the destroyer helicopter is
  2. get a rocket and jump on the metal fence next to the helicopter
  3. rocket jump off the fence and land on the helicopter
  4. you will find yourself walking on a invisible wall above the helicopter

Crossfire
Walking over the north-east buildings

  1. go north east of the map untill you see a destroyed house (end of the street)
  2. go up the stairs and jump on the chair
  3. now jump on the broken wall right before you
  4. when you are on the brokern wall, look right and jump on the second floor of the house
  5. now jump on the awry wall and jump to the thirt floor
  6. look right and there will be a invisible wall, jump on it and wal to the barbered wire
  7. you can just walk over it to the other buildings

Walking on the east buildings

  1. first do the glitch above
  2. just walk further untill you see a big border where you can’t jump on
  3. go left of it and there will be a invisible wall
  4. jump on the invisible wall and you can now jump on the big border
  5. walk to the right and jump on the other building (go right or you will fall to your death)
  6. now look left and you will see some big buildings there
  7. jump over to it and go to the little fence on the right side of the building
  8. jump over it and jump again over the other fence (it’s a little invisible)
  9. when you are on the end of the fence, jump over on a very small wall
  10. just walk over (not that simple)
  11. you can now walk around on the buildings

walking on the south buildings

  1. do the first glitch in the crossfire glitch archive
  2. just walk further untill you see a big border where you can’t jump on
  3. go left of it and there will be a invisible wall
  4. jump on the invisible wall and you can now jump on the big border
  5. walk to the right and jump on the other building (go right or you will fall to your death)
  6. now look forward and then look down untill you see a wall
  7. jump on it and you will find yourself on a invisible wall above it
  8. walk further on the wall untill toy see the buildings
  9. jump on the buildings and you can walk over it

on the west buildings

  1. go west of the map and enter the house with th stairs in it
  2. go up the stairs and walk in the first room you see
  3. jump out of the building over the broken wall, and stay on the border outside the building
  4. look right and you will see a wooden border
  5. jump on it, now jump on the window left of it
  6. look to the right and you will see a small border, jump on it and look to the left
  7. now you will see some cloth, jump on it and you can now jump on the building

on the bridge

  1. first do the glitch above
  2. no look to the right and you will se an open space
  3. look down until you see a “metal thing”
  4. jump right before it and you will find yourself on a invisible wall
  5. look to the left and walk untill you can jump on the ground
  6. now just walk until you can go up the bridge

on the middle building

  1. Go to the middle building and go up the stairs
  2. go outside and get a friend crouching on the metal fence
  3. jump on your friends head and you can now jump on the building

on the tallest building of the map

  1. go to the tallest building of the map and find a trash bin
  2. do the freeze jump on it and let your friend shoot you 11 times 4 bullets in your back
  3. hit the select button and you will find yourself on the biggest building of the map

on the building around the biggest building

  1. first do the first glitch of the crossfire glitch archive
  2. now look to the left and you will see another building where you can walk on
  3. jump on it and look to the right and look for a barbered wire on the ground
  4. walk to it and you will see a invisible wall
  5. get a friend crouching right before the invisibe wall so you wan jump on it
  6. now just walk over the barbered wire untill you can jump on the buildings

Crash

No Videos Found

on the shop

  1. first go to the building with a ladder next to the “destroyer food shop”
  2. go up the ladder and go stand on the metal endings of the ladder
  3. now jump on the white box hanging before you
  4. then jump on the small wooden thing right before you
  5. you can now walk around on the building

on the south building

  1. go whole south untill you see a wooden balcony
  2. use the freeze jump to get on it (4 times 4 bullets)
  3. when you are on it, look backward and you will see a white box on the wall
  4. jump on it and you can now jump over to the building over you

Downpour

on the middle building

  1. first find the tractor on the west side of the map
  2. jump on it and then jump on the building with a Red roof
  3. just walk to the end of the building and jump on the fireplace
  4. now jump over to the building over you (there is a invisible wall so watch out)
  5. you can now walk around on the building

out of the map

  1. go east of the map, at the house with the turret
  2. jump on the ledge of the building and let a friend crouch on it
  3. jump on your friend and you will be on the building with a turret on it
  4. look to the right and you will see a house with a metal roof
  5. use the freeze jump to get on it (4 times 4 bullets)

shooting above turret

  1. go east of the map, at the house with the turret
  2. jump on the ledge of the building and let a friend crouch on it
  3. jump on your friend and you will be on the building with a turret on it
  4. go lie down in front of the turret so you can mount it
    5)on other players screens you will be floating above the turret

shooting above turret v2

  1. go West of the map and find aq house with a turret
  2. now use the shooting above turret v1
  3. you are now shooting above the turret just like on the other side of the map

District
Up the stairs

  1. go to the west of the map and search for a big house with stairs in it
  2. when you found it, there should be a ooden box in the middle of the house
  3. get your friend crouching on the box so you can jump on him
  4. jump on him and try getting on the stairs above you
  5. you can now walk around on the stairs

Black room

  1. go south-west of the map untill you see a house with windows and fences before it
  2. jump on the big fences before it, then jump to a wooden stick right before the windows
  3. you can now enter the black room

Skywalker

  1. first do the glicth above
  2. now jump out of the windows at the left side
  3. do the freeze jump and let your friend shoot you 20-25 times 4 bullets in your back
  4. hit select and get yourself right out of the map
  5. you should land on a invisible platform, and you can now walk over the map

Out of the map

  1. do the freeze jump at the same place as the glitch above
  2. let your friend shoot you 12 times 4 bullets in your back
  3. hit selcet and land right next to the “black room” and you will be on a invisible ledge
  4. walk further untill you see the street
  5. now jump on the street and you are out of the map

Overgrown

Skywalker

  1. go east of the map untill you see a wooden box
  2. jump on the wooden box, now jump over to the metal fence on the other side
  3. now look right and keep walking on it until you are on a small building
  4. search for a barbered wire and walk against it, there is a invisible wall
  5. now do the freeze jump and let a friend shoot you 12 times 4 bullets in your back
  6. now land on the invisible wall of the barbered wire and you wan now walk over the map

Out of the map

  1. first do the skywalk glitch
  2. now walk to the west of the map
  3. there should be a small black line
  4. run right over it and you won’t fall to your death
  5. keep walking untill you see the river
  6. you can now walk out of the map

Pipeline
on the middle building

  1. go into the middle building and go up the stairs
  2. walk until you can’t go further and jump on the metal railing
  3. let a friend crouch on the metal railing right before the first room in the building
  4. jump on him so you can get on top of the first room
  5. now take your rocket and rocket jump on the metal bars
  6. you can now walk around on the middle building

in the pipes

  1. go in the cellar of the middle building
  2. now find a room with some pies and a fence before it
  3. jump crouch on the fence and you will sit on a very small ledge
  4. lie down and look forward
  5. you are now in the pipes

in the towers

  1. go west of the map where you see 3 containers
  2. get a friend crouching in front of the first container
  3. jump on his head so you can get on the container
  4. get another friend friend crouching in front of the second container
  5. jump on his head so you can get on top of the container
  6. you can now jump over to the towers

Shipment

No Videos Found

Out of the map

  1. go south east on the map at and look for wooden planks on the wall
  2. jump on the wooden planks and do the freeze jump
  3. let a friend shoot you 15 times 4 bulletsin your back
  4. hit select and keep running forward, untill you land on a blue container
  5. you can now walk out of the map

Showdown
out of the map

  1. go south-east of the map and find a market stall
  2. jump on it and now look to the left, there is a wooden plank
  3. run and jump right next to it and you will find yourself on a very small ledge
  4. look to the left and walk further to the end of the plank
  5. there will be a small ledge next to you, jup on the last part of it
  6. now take out your rocket and use the rocket jump on the building
  7. you can now walk out of the map

under the map

  1. just do the glitch above
  2. find a spot where you fall trough the ground
  3. jump in and and you will find yourself under the map

on top of the buildings

  1. go to the middle of the map (be sure you take rockets with you)
  2. you should find a wooden platform somewere
  3. jump on the platform and take out your rocket
  4. do the rocked jump on the wall on your back
  5. you are now walking on the middle building

outside map v2

  1. go north of the map where you see some wooden planks over the road
  2. go op the stairs and jump over the railing
  3. go untill you can go further anymore and look to the left
  4. walk over the wooden plank and let a friend crouch against the wall
  5. jump on his head so you get on the house
  6. now use your rocket for the second wall
  7. rocket hump on it and you can walk around on top of the building
  8. look to the left and you will see a border on the wall on the other side
  9. jump on it and walk untill you can’t go further anymore
  10. you can now jump down and go out of the map

Strike

on top of the middle building

  1. go to the middle of the map, and search for a wall with a car next to it
  2. climb on the wall and have someone standing right before the wall you want to jump on
  3. jump on his head and you are able to walk around on the house

on the middle building v2

  1. go to the north, you will see a small shop with stairs in it
  2. go up the stairs and head to the balcony
  3. get a friend crouching on the railing so you can jump on the roof
  4. now look to the left and you will see a wooden pole, jump on it
  5. now jump over to the other roof

out of the map

  1. go west of the map and find a little place between the two large buildings
  2. do freeze jump the and let your friend shoot like 12 times 4 bullets in your back
  3. hit the select button and land on the left building, and you will be on a invisible platform
  4. jump over to the other building and there will be another invisible platform
  5. go to the end of the building and look down
  6. jump on the smal ledge on the wall, then jump on the ground
  7. you are now outside the map

on other roof

  1. go north-east of the map and find a house with stairs outside
  2. go up the stairs and let a friend jump on the railings, then on the plants
  3. jump on him and you can walk around on the building

next roof

  1. do the glicth above
  2. look to the left and you will see a white roof
  3. use a freeze jump to get on it let your friend shoot you 4 times 4 bullets in your back)

Vacant
on top of vacant

  1. go north of the map where you can find a fridge
  2. jump on the fridge and look to the left
  3. there should be a wall with a small ledge on it
  4. jump crouch on it and walk untill you can’t go further anymore
  5. look left and walk in the middle of the wall, now jump on the roof

big jump

  1. when you are on the roof (see glicth above) walk untill you see a metal pole
  2. let a friend crouch before it so you can jump on it
  3. now jump to the wooden pole next to it
  4. you can now jump over on the platform

wet work
on top of the cranes

  1. go to the north cranes on wet work
  2. take the right crane and jump on the liddle ledge of it
  3. now crouch and walk to the top of the crane

swimming next to the boat

  1. first do the glitch above
  2. now jump from the top of the crane on the railing of the boat
  3. you will find yourself on a invisible wall
  4. jump off (not to much to the left) and you are now walking on the water

Universal Glitches

Rocket Jump Tutorial Video

Rocket Jump

  1. get a rocket first
  2. now go and stand where you want to do the rocket jump
  3. don’t aim down just keep looking from the hip
  4. shoot, your rocket wil automaticly zoom in
  5. when it zooms in, jump
  6. you will jump higher then normal

Freeze Jump Tutorial Video

Freeze Jump

  1. This is for PS3
  2. have a friend in your game
  3. invite him and an error should pop up
  4. now disable your controller and enable it again
  5. the error is gone now
  6. stand on the place where you want to be catapulted
  7. now jump and hit select in mid air
  8. get a friend shooting you (4 times each time) (always wait 6 seconds untill shooting again)
  9. when you are done hit select and you should fly in the air

No Videos Found For Knife Jump

Knife Jump

  1. this is simple just let a friend crouch in front of the wall
  2. jump on his head and have your friend knife you
  3. you should get a boost and jump higher

[size=27pt]Call of duty 4 glitch archive

Made By Oc LoG

(Don’t forget to thank this post if you like it)[/size]
[size=26pt]

THANKS TO NEXTGENUPDATE FOR THIS TUT AND
VIDS![/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Call of duty 4 Glitches REVELAED! With Videos!
item.dc:creator: @Kevin3654 Kevin3654
item.description:
@Kevin3654 wrote:

[size=11pt]Call Of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare Glitch Archive[/size]

[color=brown]INDEX:

Map Glitches
Universal Glitches

Map Glitch index:

AmbushBacklot

Bloc

BogCountdown

Crossfire

Crash

Downpour

District

Overgrown

Pipeline

Shipment

Showdown

Strike

Vacant

[size=25pt]Map Glitches

_______________________________________________________________[/size]

AMBUSH

VIDEO HERE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co8hheVlIC0

Out Of The Map

  1. Go whole north in the map until you see the end of the map
  2. Look right and you’ll see a wall
  3. Have one person lying down on the left of the wall
  4. Now jump on him and get over the wall

Machinegun Glitch

  1. Go whole north of the map where the machine gun is
  2. Right of the machinegun is a broken wall
  3. Climb on the broken wall and walk above the machine gun
  4. Sit down and hit the square button
  5. Other people will see you flying above the machinegun while shooting

Skywalker

  1. Get yourself out of the map with one other person
  2. Now head to the Barbered wire on the east side of the map
  3. Use the freeze jump (check Freeze jump for more information) in the barbered wire.
  4. Hit select, you will fly in the air and you will land on a invisible platform

Backlot
VIDEO HERE


On top of the construction Building

  1. Head to the north part of the map and you will see a construction building
  2. Go to the first floor and jump on the railing of the stairs
  3. Go to the end of the railing and jump to the left in the window righ before you
  4. Look to the left, go prone and keep going backward until you cant go anymore
  5. Now use your Two analog sticks at the same time and push it every second to the right
  6. After a few times you should be out of the building
  7. Now walk on the small ledge on top of the building

On top of other buildings

  1. get on top of the construction building
  2. head west on the building and have someone sit down right before the west wall
  3. jump on his head so you can get on the wall
  4. look around until you see a yellow umbrella
  5. jump on it and you can now run on all the buildings on the west side of the map

Out of the map

  1. Go to the middle building where you can go up the stairs
  2. Go on top of it and jump on the railings
  3. Look around until you see a pole
  4. Jump on the pole and now you will see a tree
  5. Jump in the tree and after you jumped in, jump on the building behind it
  6. You can now leave the map and go under it

On the south building

  1. Go to the (hald-destroyed) building in the south
  2. go to the first room on the right side and you will see a small pile of trash
  3. get your friend sitting on it and you need to jump on his head.
  4. you are now on the roo of the south building

Out of the map v2

  1. go to the north-West of the map, there should be a small parking place for cars
  2. jump on the bin on the right side of the parking place
  3. now jump over the wall right before you.
  4. you will find yourself out of the map

On Top of big building

  1. First do the “Out Of The Map Glitch”
  2. stay on the first building, look to the right and you will see a small window with a ventilator on it
  3. first jump on the ledge of the window, then jump on the ventilator
  4. you can now jump on top of the building

Under the map

  1. Do any glitch out of the map
  2. find a black place on the ground where you can jump in
  3. jump in it and you will find yourself under the map

Out of the map v3

  1. Go north-west of the map where you see a small parking place
  2. look around untill you see boxes with a invisible wall around it
  3. have someone sitting right of the boxes, and jump on his head
  4. jump untill you find yourself on the wall right next to the invisible wall
  5. jump off the wall and you are out of the map

item.source: Call of duty 4 Glitches REVELAED! With Videos!
